TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 中使用类并方法，以提供对业务对象实例之前使用的任何数据操作的访问控件和业务对象执行。The class is used in the and methods to provide access to the business object instance before any data operations that are using the control and business object are performed. 业务对象设置和使用访问属性。The business object is set and accessed using the property. 通过添加事件处理程序委托来处理事件，您可以自定义代码而不是创建业务对象的实例执行实例化。By adding an event handler delegate to handle the event, you can create an instance of the business object in custom code instead of the performing the instantiation. 希望您的业务对象或调用非默认构造函数来创建实例; 的非默认实例时，这很有用始终调用默认构造函数来创建适用于的业务对象的实例。This is useful when you want a non-default instance of your business object or to call a non-default constructor to create the instance; the always calls the default constructor to create an instance of the business object it works with. 您还可以添加事件处理程序委托来处理事件，这样就可以公开访问任何公开的成员执行的任何附加的初始化或工作的业务对象。You can also add an event handler delegate to handle the event, which enables you to access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any additional initialization or work. 并不会调用方法控件，但前提是执行数据操作的业务对象方法`static`。The and methods are not called by the control, if the business object method that performs the data operations is `static`. 控件公开可处理以在其生命周期中的不同时间使用基础业务对象的多个事件。The control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle. 下表列出了事件以及关联类和事件处理程序委托。The following table lists the events and the associated classes and event handler delegates. |EventEvent|EventArgsEventArgs|事件处理程序EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |。.

创建业务对象的实例前一刻发生。Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

创建业务对象的实例后立即发生。Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

在检索数据之前发生。Occurs before the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

执行插入、 更新或删除操作之前发生。Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.||| |。.

检索的数据后发生。Occurs after the data is retrieved.||| |, , ., , .

插入、 更新或删除操作完成后发生。Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.||| |。.

在业务对象被销毁之前发生。Occurs before a business object is destroyed.||| ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件检索和显示信息。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例使用示例基本业务对象。The second code example provides the example basic business object that the first code example uses. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件检索和显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 在此示例中，如下所示许多实际方案中，可能不会也可能不适合使用默认实例使用的业务对象控件。In this example, as in many real-world scenarios, it might not be possible nor appropriate to use a default instance of the business object with the control. 在此示例中，不能成功调用默认构造函数，因为它将引发异常。In this example, the cannot successfully call the default constructor because it will throw an exception. 在某些情况下，可能会受保护的默认构造函数并在其他它可能不会初始化到所需状态的业务对象。In some cases, the default constructor might be protected and in others it might not initialize the business object to a desired state. 无论什么原因，您可以自己创建的业务对象实例并将实例设置为属性的对象传递给处理程序。Whatever the reason, you can create an instance of the business object yourself and set the instance to the property of the object that is passed to the handler. 这是业务对象实例的将用于执行其工作。This is the business object instance that the will use to perform its work. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/objds15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/objds15vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了前面的代码示例使用示例基本业务对象。The following code example demonstrates the example basic business object that the preceding code example uses. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/northwindemployee15.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/northwindemployee15.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置表示一个业务对象的对象， 控件使用该业务对象执行数据操作。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the business object with which the control performs data operations.

remarks.format: ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件检索和显示信息。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例使用示例基本业务对象。The second code example provides the example basic business object that the first code example uses. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件检索和显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 在此示例中，如下所示许多实际方案中，可能不会也可能不适合使用默认实例使用的业务对象控件。In this example, as in many real-world scenarios, it might not be possible nor appropriate to use a default instance of the business object with the control. 在此示例中，不能成功调用默认构造函数，因为它将引发异常。In this example, the cannot successfully call the default constructor because it will throw an exception. 在某些情况下，可能会受保护的默认构造函数并在其他它可能不会初始化到所需状态的业务对象。In some cases, the default constructor might be protected and in others it might not initialize the business object to a desired state. 无论什么原因，您可以自己创建的业务对象实例并将实例设置为属性的对象传递给处理程序。Whatever the reason, you can create an instance of the business object yourself and set the instance to the property of the object that is passed to the handler. 这是业务对象实例的将用于执行其工作。This is the business object instance that the will use to perform its work. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/objds15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/objds15vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了前面的代码示例使用示例基本业务对象。The following code example demonstrates the example basic business object that the preceding code example uses.
